thread.title: Girl of 6 lured to wooded area and subjected to 'sex attack by 12-year-old boy'
thread.title_full: Girl of 6 lured to wooded area and subjected to 'sex attack by 12-year-old boy'

author: Jane Hamilton
title: Girl of 6 lured to wooded area and subjected to 'sex attack by 12-year-old boy'
text:
The little girl was allegedly lured to a wooded area and attacked (pic posed by model) (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A girl of six was allegedly sexually assaulted by a 12-year-old boy as she played near her home. 
The little girl was lured to a secluded area by the boy and a friend where she allegedly suffered a serious sex attack . 
The boy has been reported to the children's reporter in connection with the attack which happened last month in an East Lothian town, the Daily Record reported . 
Many locals have now signed a petition demanding that the boy accused of the attack is removed from the area. Read More Schoolgirl, 15, who was 'bullied and raped' wrote powerful letter to classmates before killing herself 
A Police Scotland spokeswoman said: “Police in East Lothian were called following a report of a sexual assault in the Prestonpans area. 
The incident was reported to police on Monday 23rd January and a 12-year-old boy has since been reported to the Children's Reporter.” Read More Woman aged 81 raped after getting off bus on busy high street 
She added: “Police were made aware of comments posted to a social media website on Sunday, February 12, which contained details of a complaint recently made to Police Scotland. Officers have visited those involved and have now given advice to all concerned parties. 
"Matters involving children cause distress, not only to those involved, but also to the wider community. 
“Police Scotland would reassure the public that we are working with our partners in the criminal justice sector to ensure that all reasonable steps are being taken to protect them and would ask that proceedings into this incident are allowed to take place without interference.” Like us on Facebook
